description:
Enough space for the essentials to hit the trails. It includes a Hydraulics LT 2.5L hydration reservoir that rides in its own dedicated compartment to make refills a snap and protect your gear from accidental spills. Attachments for a standard or full-face helmet and a ventilated Airscape™ suspension keep you cool on the climbs. And if things go wrong, the interior has tool organizer slots.

  • Airscape back panel channels airflow while keeping the load close to your body for stability
  • Shoulder straps and back panel have breathable mesh overlay and soft edges
  • Front shove-it pocket lets you stash extra layers
  • Front organizer pocket opens wide so you can quickly grab tools, tubes and pumps
  • Internal pocket has a scratch-free lining to protect sunnies or electronics
  • Removable webbing waistbelt
  • Dedicated hydration compartment with included Osprey Hydraulics® LT 2.5L reservoir
  • Magnetic clip keeps the bite valve tethered
  • Low-profile helmet carry attachment slips through your helmet's vents to hold it securely in place
  • Loop for a blinky light. (not included)
name: Osprey Siskin 8 Hydration Pack - Men's
